tasks.label: Prepare OpenMask3D Scene
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "bash -lc 'source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate spot_env && python -m scripts.point_cloud_scripts.full_align --scan-name ${input:scanName} --skip-autowalk --visualize 2>&1 | tee openmask3d_scene_prep.log'" &
tasks.detail: Prepare an OpenMask3D Scene - The preparation script reprojects the iPhone capture into the folder structure expected by OpenMask3D. Output folder: data/aligned_point_clouds/<scan-name>/, containing pose/, color/, depth/, intrinsic/, scene.ply, and mesh.obj.
